ViewObject.Name: AppUserCustView
ViewObject.SelectList: AppUserCust.USER_NAME, AppUserCust.CUSTOMER_ID, (SELECT ARC.CUSTOMER_NUMBER || ' - ' || ARC.CUSTOMER_NAME || ' - ' || flex.description FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS ARC, APPS.FCS_FLEX_VALUES_VL FLEX WHERE flex.flex_value = arc.attribute5 AND ARC.CUSTOMER_ID = AppUserCust.CUSTOMER_ID) AS CUSTOMER_NAME

ViewAttribute.Name: CustomerName
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT ARC.CUSTOMER_NUMBER || ' - ' || ARC.CUSTOMER_NAME || ' - ' || flex.description FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS ARC, APPS.FCS_FLEX_VALUES_VL FLEX WHERE flex.flex_value = arc.attribute5 AND ARC.CUSTOMER_ID = AppUserCust.CUSTOMER_ID
